summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4170 for the improvement of Myrtle Street, from Rainier Avenue to Seward Park Avenue; by constructing sewers; under Ordinance No. 49769, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
